snippet: Frank DiMattina, who is said to be an associate of the Genovese crime family, is accused of shaking down a man who bought Ariana’s Catering Hall from him in March.
abstract: Frank DiMattina, said to be an associate of the Genovese crime family, goes on trial for extortion, accused of shaking down rival Walter Bowers, to whom he had sold a Staten Island catering hall; the contract between the two men over the sale of the hall left their affairs tangled, and they have feuded over the transaction ever since.
lead_paragraph: Frank DiMattina, who is said to be an associate of the Genovese crime family, is accused of shaking down a man who bought Ariana’s Catering Hall from him in March.

headline.seo: Frank DiMattina Accused of Threatening a Catering Rival
headline.main: From Dreams of Reality-Show Stardom to Accusations of Tough-Guy Extortion
headline.print_headline: From Dreams of Reality-Show Stardom to Accusations of Tough-Guy Extortion
